author: senh
title: Talk about Travel
text: BING NEWS: Ex-members of church where teens were beaten talk of decline ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) - Former members of the upstate New York church where two teens were viciously beaten paint a picture of a once vibrant and joyous house of worship that declined into a place of fear and intimidation under new leadership.
